semantic_identifier: [GOLD-197]: Define canonical Issue_Tracker status model and cross-system mapping table
title: Define canonical Issue_Tracker status model and cross-system mapping table

sections.text: Create a canonical set of Issue_Tracker issue statuses (with allowed transitions) that can represent support, engineering, and sales states consistently. Implement a status mapping table that links Zendesk/Intercom, Jira/Linear, and CRM statuses to the canonical model, including handling for missing/unknown and deprecated external statuses. Expose this mapping via configuration (seeded defaults + editable) so later sync logic can rely on a single source of truth.
